title: Landing Company Details Send
description: Binary.com has a number of licensed subsidiaries in various jurisidictions, which are called Landing Companies (and which are wholly owned subsidiaries of the Binary Group). This call provides information about each Landing Company.

landing_company_details.description: Landing company shortcode (for example: costarica, malta, maltainvest, iom)

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
